OOC: So are we going to start this with the Maximal and Predacon 
(and other) ships crashing like last time?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> OOC: I'll pick number 1. I'll make the first post with out chars 
coming back, Airly. Then we can have the numbers take effect.
>  
> :: Rodimus Prime : :
>  
> Ten years have passed. Rodimus, the former leader of the Maximals 
on this planet had left Earth with his family, to hunt down Unicron. 
It turned out to be futile. They then returned to Cybertron and 
helped overthrow the controlling Tripredacus government. The 
Maximals had regained control of the Transformers homeworld.
>  
> In the meantime the transwarp rift through time has allowed a full 
Cybertronian civilization to inhabit Past-Earth with multiple cities 
and cultures. All of this before the human race develops and while 
their Cybertronian past lays dorment in a volcano where the Autobot 
Starship Ark had crashed.
>  
> This is the new age of the Neo Beast Wars!
>  
> A small Cybertronian craft comes through the rift. Sometrhing is 
wrong, the ship is out of control. The pilot... A father, a Maximal 
leader, an Autobot legend, is unable to stabalize the ship. The 
ship, that carries his wife and daughter, crashes on the planet 
surface. It is beyond repair and the Transformers onboard are in 
stasis lock.
>  
> It begins...
> 
>
